resources.string: Kindly consider the below-mentioned guidelines before presenting and submitting a Mandate :
1. Make sure there are no scribblings or overwriting over the mandate.
2. Make sure all the mandatory fields are filled or marked.
3. Make sure the mandate is completely positioned inside the rectangular stencil while capturing.
4. Make sure the image is visible (No Blur/Glair) before the final submission. If not, recapture the image to prevent rejection.
5. Make sure no external objects are covering any field in the captured mandate before submission.
OpenCV : %1s \n Threshold value is %2s \n current score is %3s
